abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of: (i)
            construction, furniture and equipment for four new and two
            extensions to lower secondary rural schools, science
            laboratories and industrial arts and home science workshops
            for twenty-five existing lower secondary schools, and five
            new vocational training centers; (ii) technical assistance
            in the form of six man-years of specialists' services,
            and twenty-four man-years of fellowships; and (iii)
            assistance to project unit administration.
